task.title: Hide a video view
task.shortdesc: After a MediaPlayer view has been used to play video, you can hide it and display it again by using a method or manually.

taskbody.prereq: You must pause a video before clearing it or moving it from the display.

step.cmd: Option 1: Clear the video frame with MediaPlayer.clearVideoâ€‹ and replace the frame later.

substep.cmd: Pause the video that you want to hide.
Remove the displayed video frame by calling MediaPlayer.clearVideo.
To reset the MediaPlayer so that it can be played again, call replaceCurrentResource or replaceCurrentItem.

step.cmd: Option 2: Move the MediaPlayer view off the screen and move it back later without having to replace it.
